body.name: American Crew Men's Face Wash, In-Shower Facial Wash, Oil-Free, Removes Excess Oil & Dirt, 6.4 Fl Oz
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 14 hrs 34 mins
features: MENS FACE WASH: American Crew Acumen In-shower Face Wash formula is designed to keep your face clean and feeling fresh
FOR YOUR SKIN: Our formula contains vitamins combining antioxidant and moisturizing agents, while the naturally certified American Crew signature fragrance energizes and invigorates

KEY BENEFITS: Clear up any build up for healthier and smoother skin. Keep your skin hydrated, soft, supple, and youthful-looking. Sweep away dry and dead skin cells, revealing a fresh layer of skin for a natural glow
HOW TO USE: Recommended for use in the shower, massage over face, rinse thoroughly

WHO WE ARE: American Crew is a leader in, Men's Grooming for HAIR, BODY, SHAVE, STYLE, FRAGRANCE categories. American Crew's ongoing commitment is to elevate men's style and enhance their personal image.
body.description: Product Description American Crew has been redefining what it means to be a well groomed man. Innovative grooming products and pioneering education have been defining grooming for 25 years. Creating and caring for everything needed in men's styles. American Crew is a leader in, Men's Grooming for HAIR, BODY, SHAVE, STYLE, COLOGNE, and SKINCARE categories. As the global leader in men's grooming and the "Official Supplier to Men", American Crew's ongoing commitment to elevate men's style and enhance their personal image by providing education and marketing to share the brands' vision. Brand Story Official Supplier to Men

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I enjoy using it.
reviews.reviewText: I like the thickness of it. I use it to shave with. Very nice smell. Recommended. Will buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works so well, my wife has started using it!
reviews.reviewText: Amazed at how my pores have cleared up and are barely visible. My wife was looking at me while I was asleep and was the first to notice how my skin(cheeks and nose area) have brightened and how the pores are hard to see. She began using the face wash too. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND YOU MEN STOCK UP ON THIS GREAT PRODUCT.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice smell and texture
reviews.reviewText: I like the scent of this and the somewhat thick consistency. It's slightly pricier than competitors. Does not seem to dry my skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Feels like quality ingredients
reviews.reviewText: I like how it has a thicker feel to it. I've only been using it for a few days so its too soon to tell if it works good. The bottle is small but you also don't need much at all. Smells pretty good too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Leaves you feeling clean but not dry. Great smell and will last a awhile. I have pretty sensitive skin and this has not bothered me one bit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works very well.
reviews.reviewText: Works wonders. Bottle will last many months.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cleansing and Nice but Shipping is Terrible
reviews.reviewText: The product itself is top notch. Really great. Very soothing, easy to apply, and refreshing. No issues. The issues I have are with the shipping. Product is shipped in an ENVENLOPE when ordered by itself and not part of a larger order. This poor, little plastic bottle got thrown around the amazon warehouse, the delivery truck, and then finally on my doorstep. At the end of the trip, the plastic bottle was damaged and the nozzle was splintered and broken, with the plastic shattered. I like the product, but if you are getting it, roll it into a larger order and do not order it by itself.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars If you like American Crew products .....
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a new face wash and I found this by American Crew . I already use their shampoo and body wash . I like how it makes my face feel after using it . it has a fresh fragrance and I would recommend it .
Utilizo el producto para la limpieza matinal y la verdad es que te deja la piel sin brillos y con una sensación de limpieza agradable, me gusta el producto.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 10, 2020
reviews.reviewText: Nice face wash that comes in a handy pump bottle. Not the cheapest but also not boutique apothecary priced either. Nice fresh scent, not too much lather, and leaves you feeling clean. I occasionally get blocked pores and ingrowing hairs but definitely less so after I started using this every morning.I always follow it with a decent moisturiser, think that is a must unless you have very oily skin naturally.If you’re looking at the product and know how much it costs, and don’t think that is too much for a face wash - then give it a shot!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 13, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: Nice men’s face wash with anti pollutant ingredients
reviews.reviewText: Okay so this is a little on the more expensive side in terms of face washes, especially from a brand that I haven’t heard of before, but I think it’s worth it. Personally I’d recommend a price point slightly lower, because for the average person it is a little on the pricey side, but it’s good for a treat for birthdays, Christmases, etc...This face wash is nice because it’s produced with active ingredients like ginger root that does help to give the skin a thorough cleanse, and help to remove toxins from the skin bought about by pollutants in the environment. It smells good, the scent is very refreshing and awakening in the morning.Now I’m not sure why it’s labelled as ‘in shower’ because I would of thought that most face washes can be used in the shower, I mean they are intended to be used with water, so I’m assuming the marketing slogan of this face wash is basically just to say that it’s a face wash that is for use with water, but honestly you could wash your face in the sink with it, you don’t NEED to be in the shower to use it.It’s easy to use the product- simply pump out of the bottle like you would a hand wash, and this method does ensure no unnecessary loss of the gel when attempting to get some out of the bottle, like those that are upside down squeeze bottles.Presentation is nice- it’s a ‘manly’ enough bottle I suppose, my husband is comfortable enough with both using it at home and taking it away with us.He has noticed a nice anti-aging affect on his skin also, although that could just be due to the skins elasticity tightening somewhat due to the active ingredients, but non the less he’s happy enough with the results and wants to continue using it.
